author: McDy00
post_text: June 12, 2014 at 5:13 AM#1I'm trying to create a macro, and in part of it, I would like to have lines that would change the ZOOM value of two fixtures.How can I write the lines ?LINE1 = Fixture 300 + 301LINE2 = PresetType "Zoom" at 50any ideas ?Thanks

posts.author: McDy00
posts.post_text: June 12, 2014 at 5:13 AM#1I'm trying to create a macro, and in part of it, I would like to have lines that would change the ZOOM value of two fixtures.How can I write the lines ?LINE1 = Fixture 300 + 301LINE2 = PresetType "Zoom" at 50any ideas ?Thanks

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: June 12, 2014 at 9:18 AM#2if you want to change the attribute, use the attribute keyword:LINE1 = Fixture 300 + 301LINE2 = Attribute "Zoom" at 50

posts.author: McDy00
posts.post_text: June 12, 2014 at 7:33 PM#3great, thank you Glad

title: Macro to Add value to an "attribute of feature"
